A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I liked the movie. I just couldn't stand the direction that Luke's character went in\, he saved his father\, but tried to kill kylo/ben because he was a mild cunty teenager? I cannot accept it... The fan theories were all so exciting! This outcome was the most unexpected and also the least reasonable. I know Luke wasn't the main character but I still think he was a more serious and dignified character then how he was portrayed in TLJ. In honesty it ruined the experience for me (a long with the jokes).
